name: Name
title: Title
enter.title: Enter a title
dashboard.empty: You don't have any messages yet
widgets.add.step.one.text: To connect, you need to create a Telegram bot
widgets.add.step.one.sub_step_1: Type @BotFather in the search box and select the bot.
widgets.add.step.one.sub_step_2: Click start to activate the BotFather bot.
widgets.add.step.one.sub_step_3: Select or type the /newbot command and send it.
widgets.add.step.one.sub_step_4: Give a name and nickname to the bot. The nickname must be unique and end with the word "bot".
widgets.add.step.one.sub_step_5: You will need a token to connect. Copy the token value and click "Continue".
widgets.add.step.three.text: Now in order to receive messages, you need to launch the bot
widgets.add.step.three.sub_step_1: Find your bot in the search or follow the link from the BotFather message.
widgets.add.step.three.sub_step_2: Click start to activate the bot.
widgets.add.step.three.sub_step_3: Write to the bot from the accounts you want to receive messages to.
widgets.add.step.four.text: Select the operators to whom messages will be sent in Telegram.
widgets.add.step.four.not_agent: There is no information on operators, repeat the previous step.
widgets.add.field.name: Come up with a widget name
widgets.add.field.token.title: Telegram bot token
widgets.add.field.token.text: Insert the token obtained in the previous step
widgets.add.title: Adding a widget
widgets.empty: You haven't added a widget yet
widgets.promo:
In this section you can create and customize forms for your sites
The visual form editor is available in the settings. And with the help of the test page, you can see how the widget will look on the site and try to send yourself a message

widget.settings.options.agents.text: Operators that accept messages in Telegram
widget.settings.label: Form button
widget.settings.label.field.text.descrip: Text when hovering over the form button
widget.settings.label.title: Customize the appearance of the form button
widget.settings.label.text: Here you can customize the appearance of the form opening button
widget.settings.install.title: Installing a widget on a website
widget.settings.install.text: In order to accept customer requests from the site, you need to install the following code on each page of your site before the closing </head> tag:
